entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High 6 except plus 1 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6 except plus 1 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023
